quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to open the portal. And then, attempt to move south. Then, go to the east. With that over with, move south. With that over with, pick up the cuboid key from the floor of the kitchen. Then, venture south. With that accomplished, move west. And then, try to move south. With that accomplished, head east. And then, make absolutely sure that the cuboid safe is unlocked. Alright, thanks!
commands: unlock cuboid safe with cuboid key
unlock cuboid safe with cuboid key

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a restroom. An usual one.

 You can make out [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] cuboid safe.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cuboid safe contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cuboid safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: scullery
infos.desc:
You are in a scullery. A typical kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just moved into a cookhouse.

 You can see a pan. [if there is something on the s_0]On the pan you see [a list of things on the s_0]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a saucepan. The saucepan is typical.[if there is something on the s_1] On the saucepan you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Silly saucepan, silly, empty, good for nothing saucepan.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookery. A normal kind of place.

 Hey, want to see a freezer? Look over there, a freezer.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The freezer contains [a list of things in the c_1]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The freezer is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
A laminated notice tells you that you are now in the canteen.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You are in a laundry place. An usual one. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. A typical kind of place. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You make out [if c_2 is locked]a locked[else if c_2 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] locker.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a workbench. [if there is something on the s_2]On the workbench you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just entered a bar.

 You can make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You scan the room for a bed stand, and you find a bed stand. The bed stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bed stand you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed stand.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bathroom.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a bedroom.

 You can see a mantelpiece. You wonder idly who left that here. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the mantelpiece.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. An usual one. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 Oh, great. Here's a formless safe.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The formless safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east.

[if there is something on the s_5]On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_5]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]The chair appears to be empty.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You've entered a pantry. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You can see a crate.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The crate is empty![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. A typical one.

 Look over there! a counter. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the counter. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You move on, clearly angry about your TextWorld experience.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a Canadian safe. What a waste of a day![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

You find yourself in a dish-pit. A typical one.

 [if c_8 is locked]A locked[else if c_8 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] refrigerator is in the corner.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The refrigerator contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The refrigerator is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: sweaty cookhouse
infos.desc:
You are in a cookhouse. A sweaty kind of place.

 Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a board. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the board.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can make out a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_8] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_8]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing is empty. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
I am excited to announce that you are now in the spare room. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

walkthrough: unlock cuboid safe with cuboid key

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First stop, open the portal within the bedroom. And then, make an attempt to take a trip south. That done, make an attempt to head east. Once you finish that, travel south. With that done, retrieve the cuboid key from the floor of the kitchen. And then, head south. Then, make an attempt to venture west. After that, go to the south. With that accomplished, make an effort to move east. And then, unlock the cuboid safe in the restroom. Alright, thanks!
